activities_info.details: Sourcing and coordinating PPE donations from the community to support our healthcare workers at UVMMC. Information can be found at www.vtcovid.com.

activities_info.details: The LCOMcares Service Corps - COVID-19 initiative facilitates the pairing of student, staff, and faculty volunteers with service needs related to COVID-19 preparedness.
